mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectGodStdCtgry Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ STD_CTGRY_NO , UPPER_STD_CTGRY_NO , STD_CTGRY_NM , CHRG_MD_ADMIN_ID , SORT_SEQ , DELETE_YN , LEAF_CTGRY_YN , HS_CD , HS_CD_NM , PC_SIZE_IMG_SJ , PC_SIZE_IMG_FILE_URL , PC_SIZE_IMG_ALTRTV_CONT , PC_SIZE_IMG_HTML , MOBILE_SIZE_IMG_SJ , MOBILE_SIZE_IMG_FILE_URL , MOBILE_SIZE_IMG_ALTRTV_CONT , MOBILE_SIZE_IMG_HTML , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM GOD_STD_CTGRY WHERE 1 = 1 AND STD_CTGRY_NO = #{stdCtgryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteGodStdCtgry Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM GOD_STD_CTGRY WHERE 1 = 1 AND STD_CTGRY_NO = #{stdCtgryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
